Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Lindner Hotel AM KU'DAMM places you in the heart of Berlin, walking distance from Theatre of the West and Kaethe Kollwitz Museum. This 4-star hotel is close to Reichstag Building and Brandenburg Gate.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 146 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Partially open bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). This hotel also features a television in the lobby and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and express check-in. Planning an event in Berlin? This hotel has facilities measuring 430 square feet (40 square meters), including a meeting room.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Theatre of the West - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Kaethe Kollwitz Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
The Story of Berlin - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Europa Center - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Berlin Zoo - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
KaDeWe - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Technical University - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Bauhaus Archive - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Deutsche Oper Berlin - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Victory Column - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Grips-Theater - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Schaubuehne - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Bellevue Palace - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Schoneberg City Hall - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld) - 17.8 km / 11 mi

The preferred airport for Lindner Hotel AM KU'DAMM is Berlin (TXL-Tegel).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Lindner Hotel AM KU'DAMM are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schonefeld) - 17.8 km / 11 mi
